basic_information.scholarship_notes: Donors would like to see the recipient perform.

description: This scholarship was established in 2020 in honor of Lillian and Pruett Edwards. Eligibility Dance Major Full-time undergraduate student Sophomore, junior or senior student Minimum GPA 3.0+ Provide a personal essay explaining background, career/life goals and any artistic endeavors outside of the department coursework Requirements Personal artist statement (250 words) Official transcript

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
